sentences.en: a crimson dress
sentences.cn: 深红色连衣裙

sentences.en: Carrie's cheek burned with a crimson heat.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉的脸颊烧得绯红.

sentences.en: Crimson draperies were looped along the walls.
sentences.cn: 四面墙壁上悬垂着深红色环状打褶的装饰织物.

sentences.en: Finally I came upon a patch of gorgeous crimson leaves.
sentences.cn: 最后我又找到一族艳丽无比的红叶.

sentences.en: He flushed crimson with indignation.
sentences.cn: 他因愤怒而脸红.

sentences.en: He turned crimson under the insults.
sentences.cn: 他的脸因受到侮辱而涨得通红.

sentences.en: Her face went crimson and she did not answer.
sentences.cn: 她顿时脸涨得通红,说不出话来.

sentences.en: I used to refuse invitations to parties because I knew I'd go crimson every time someone talked to me.
sentences.cn: 我过去总是拒绝聚会邀请，因为我知道每当有人和我说话，我就会脸红。

sentences.en: Inside, the crimson room bloomed with light.
sentences.cn: 室内, 那间绊红色的屋子灯火辉煌.

sentences.en: Maple leaves have turned crimson.
sentences.cn: 枫叶已经红了.

sentences.en: My face went crimson (which it does out of sheer funk).
sentences.cn: 我的脸变得通红（我极度恐慌时就会如此）。

sentences.en: She flushed crimson with shame.
sentences.cn: 她羞愧得两颊绯红.

sentences.en: She went crimson with embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 她羞得满脸通红.

sentences.en: Slashes of crimson peep from the lining of his ochre coat, suggesting, perhaps, that there is life in the old fellow yet.
sentences.cn: 赭色外套的衬里上，深红条纹隐约可见，这也许暗示着在这位老者身上依旧有着年轻的活力。

sentences.en: Smith said the crimson anthocyanin protects the delicate mechanisms that allow the tree to extract all the nutrients from its leaves.
sentences.cn: 史密斯说，深红色的花青素保护着微妙的机制，它让树木从叶子里提取所需要的全部营养物。

sentences.en: So for your next holiday party, go for a LRD (Little Red Dress), and suggest he wear a crimson tie to match.
sentences.cn: 所以说，下一个节日派对，穿着小红裙去吧，还要建议你的那个他也打上一条深红色领带。

sentences.en: Spruance patted his crimson face with a square - folded handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 斯普鲁恩斯用块摺得方方正正的手拍抹抹红彤彤的脸.

sentences.en: The apex of the flames licked the crimson sky.
sentences.cn: 火焰的舌尖舔卷着绯红色的天空。

sentences.en: The leaves turn crimson in autumn.
sentences.cn: 树叶在秋天变成了深红色。

sentences.en: They walked past stalls selling huge sprays of crimson, saffron and cobalt flowers.
sentences.cn: 他们经过很多卖花的摊位，摊位上摆着大把大把的鲜花，有深红色的，有金黄色的，还有深蓝色的。

trans.tran_en: if your face crimsons, it becomes red because you are embarrassed
